content.rendered:
Looking for employment in the fields of robotics and AI/machine learning?
OR
Hiring? Seeking top robotics and AI/machine learning technical talent?

MassRobotics is conducting a Robotics Engineering Career Fair on May 11, 2022 from 5:00pm – 7:00pm at the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center.

Interested in Attending the Robotics Summit & Expo and Career Fair?

Register Now
Interested in Attending the Career Fair only?
 

Register Now


Co-Located With Robotics Summit
The Robotics Engineering Career Fair is co-located with the Robotics Summit & Expo and will take place immediately after the Robotics Summit concludes. It will draw from both Robotics Summit attendees, as well as from the robotics/AI community at large.

Two Ways to Participate
The MassRobotics Career Fair provides opportunities for both job seekers and producers of robotics and AI/machine learning technologies and services seeking qualified, motivated, engineering talent.

Individuals Seeking Careers – The robotics industry is growing exponentially, and talent is in high demand. This targeted event is designed for technical industry job seekers, including both recent graduates and seasoned engineers, computer scientists, vision specialists, mechatronics experts, AI professionals, and all others seeking career opportunities with robotics/AI companies. Companies from start-ups to industry leaders will be hosting information tables where candidates can learn more about the company, find out what positions are open, and schedule interviews. Free and open to the public, job seekers must register in advance.

Companies Seeking Talent – The robotics industry is growing exponentially, and talent is in high demand. If you are interested in participating in our targeted career fair please contact: Sayo@massrobotics.org

We will provide: table at the conclusion of the Robotics Summit & Expo, space forpullup banner, marketing, list of attendees

What you provide: png logo, twitter handle, manpower for booth, invoice address

Our previous career fairs have attracted over 600 candidates and are designed for technical industry job seekers, including both recent graduates and seasoned engineers, computer scientists, vision specialists, mechatronics experts, AI professionals, and others seeking career opportunities with robotics/AI companies.

Participating Companies:

Presented by:
